org.xbib.marc.io

Class BytesArray

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.xbib.marc.io.BytesArray
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BytesReference

    public class BytesArray
extends java.lang.Object
implements BytesReference
    A byte array, wrapped in a BytesReference.
